sentences.sContent: He heard the heavy rounds gouge the ancient concrete, followed by the panicked cries of Grunts in the distance as they dove for cover—and into the semi-gelatinous, ankle-deep liquid.
sentences.sContent_eng: He heard the heavy rounds gouge the ancient concrete, followed by the panicked cries of Grunts in the distance as they dove for cover—and into the semi-gelatinous, ankle-deep liquid.
sentences.sCn: 子弹凿击古老混凝土的声音清晰可辨，接着远处传来了野猪兽卧倒在深及脚踝的半凝胶状液体中隐蔽时恐慌的呼喊声。

phrases.pCn: 断层泥；断层破碎物；耳巴泥
